org.agorava.api.oauth.application

Interface OAuthAppSettingsBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PropertyOAuthAppSettingsBuilder, SimpleOAuthAppSettingsBuilder

    public interface OAuthAppSettingsBuilder
    Builder for an OAuthAppSettings can be initialized directly from fields name or from an Array of Param in case of Annotation configuration with OAuthApplication.

    For this last purpose, the interface OAuthAppSettingsBuilder contains constants for fields name should the configuration being read from a text file.

    Author:
    Antoine Sabot-Durand

      static String PREFIX

      static String SCOPE
      key label for the scope of the OAuth application

    • Method Detail

      • qualifier

        OAuthAppSettingsBuilder qualifier(Annotation qualifier)
        Set the qualifier of the Social Media for which the settings are intended.
        Parameters:
        qualifier - the name of the related Social Media
        Returns:
        the current OAuthAppSettingsBuilder

      • name

        OAuthAppSettingsBuilder name(String name)
        Set the name of the Social Media for which the settings are intended
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the related Social Media
        Returns:
        the current OAuthAppSettingsBuilder

      • apiKey

        OAuthAppSettingsBuilder apiKey(String apiKey)
        Set the Social Media application consumer key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - the consumer (public) OAuth key
        Returns:
        the current OAuthAppSettingsBuilder

      • apiSecret

        OAuthAppSettingsBuilder apiSecret(String apiSecret)
        Set the Social Media application secret key
        Parameters:
        apiSecret - the secret (private) OAuth key
        Returns:
        the current OAuthAppSettingsBuilder

      • callback

        OAuthAppSettingsBuilder callback(String callback)
        Set the Callback for the application
        Parameters:
        callback - a callback url or 'oob' if the application is not on the web
        Returns:
        the current OAuthAppSettingsBuilder

      • scope

        OAuthAppSettingsBuilder scope(String scope)
        Set the OAuth 2.0 scope for the application
        Parameters:
        scope - list (string separated by commas) of authorized action defined by Social Media for the application
        Returns:
        the current OAuthAppSettingsBuilder

      • params

        OAuthAppSettingsBuilder params(Param[] params)
        Load builder params with an array of Param. This method can be used when params for OAuthAppSettings are defined through an annotation.
        Parameters:
        params - parameters collection to configure the builder
        Returns:
        the current OAuthAppSettingsBuilder

      • build

        OAuthAppSettings build()
        Builds the OAuthAppSettings
        Returns:
        the application settings

      • readFromSettings

        OAuthAppSettingsBuilder readFromSettings(OAuthAppSettings settings)
        Set builder params from an existing OAuthAppSettings
        Parameters:
        settings - settings to read from
        Returns:
        the current OAuthAppSettingsBuilder
